channel.title: Is it possible to use an item on a NPC? if so pelase help
channel.description:
imt rying to use an item on an npc so here is my code but i get an error help please?
[code]else if (useItemID == 5091 && atNPCID == 1001){ addItem(randomKA(),1); deleteItem(981, GetItemSlot(981), 1); }[/code]
help pelase?
my error is [code]client.java:15308: cannot find symbol symbol : variable atNPCID location: class client else if (useItemID == 5295 && atNPCID == 1001) ^ Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 1 error Files Compiled Successfully! Press any key to continue . . .[/code]

item.title: Is it possible to use an item on a NPC? if so pelase help
item.dc:creator: @I_Br3ndan_I I Br3ndan I
item.description:
@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

There obviously isn’t a method;

atNPCID == NPCID

It’s gotta be something else.

Read full topic
